LanguageData.DSGUI_Warn: Requires DeepStorage's right click to be disabled!
LanguageData.DSGUI_AdvWarn: [Not Functional Yet] This setting is for advanced users. Unless you know what you are doing or have been advised to use it, leave it.
LanguageData.DSGUI_UseTranspiler: Use Transpiler instead of Prefix Method
LanguageData.DSGUI_SavePosSize: Save last set window size and position
